description: Generates a list of squares of numbers using list comprehension.

optimal_code.list_comprehension: squares = [x**2 for x in range(1, n+1)]

description: Filters even numbers from a list using list comprehension.

optimal_code.list_comprehension: evens = [x for x in numbers if x % 2 == 0]

description: Converts all words in a list to uppercase using list comprehension.

topic: Create all (x, y) pairs for two lists
description: Generates all possible (x, y) pairs from two lists using list comprehension.

optimal_code.list_comprehension: pairs = [(x, y) for x in list1 for y in list2]

topic: Convert a list of lists into a flat list
description: Flattens a nested list into a single list using list comprehension.

optimal_code.list_comprehension: flat_list = [item for sublist in nested_list for item in sublist]

description: Replaces negative numbers in a list with 0 using list comprehension.

optimal_code.list_comprehension: non_negative = [x if x >= 0 else 0 for x in numbers]

topic: Get all digits in a string
description: Extracts all digit characters from a string using list comprehension.

optimal_code.list_comprehension: digits = [ch for ch in s if ch.isdigit()]
